scripts.dev: ./ssh-tunnel.sh & tunnel=$!; trap "kill $tunnel" EXIT INT TERM; npm i --no-audit && concurrently -k -n shared,api,web 'cd app/shared && npm run dev' 'cd app/api && npm run dev' 'cd app/web && npm run dev'
scripts.lint: npm i --no-audit && concurrently -k -n shared,api,web 'cd app/shared && npm run lint' 'cd app/api && npm run lint' 'cd app/web && npm run lint'
scripts.test: ./ssh-tunnel.sh & tunnel=$!; trap "kill $tunnel" EXIT INT TERM; npx cypress run
scripts.migrate: ./ssh-tunnel.sh & tunnel=$!; trap "kill $tunnel" EXIT INT TERM; cd app/api && npm i && npm run migrate
scripts.prepare: concurrently -n shared,api,web 'cd app/shared && npm i --no-audit' 'cd app/api && npm i --no-audit' 'cd app/web && npm i --no-audit'
scripts.pre-push: npm ci && cd app/shared && npm run build && cd ../api && npm run build && cd ../web && npm run build
